title: Inside new mum Brooke Vincent's Manchester home where she will raise baby Mexx
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Brooke Vincent, 26, gave birth earlier this week to a little baby boy Mexx S J Bryan who she shares her Sheffield United footballer partner Kean Bryan, 22.

As the Coronation Steet actress, who has played Sophie Webster on the ITV soap for 15 years, and her sportsman boyfriend become first-time parents, here is a look inside their Mancunian home.

The gorgeous couple are sure to enjoy cuddles with their new addition in their stunning open-plan living room.

Proving they have a taste for interior design, the front room is full of quirky touches that contrast with the gleaming white tiled flooring and beige walls.

The living space boasts a comfortable brunt orange L-shaped sofa plumped up cushions with a white and terracotta geometric design - perfect for kicking back and relaxing with their tot.

(Image: Instagram)

Adding to the eclectic vibe is a multi-coloured rug splashed with hints of turquoise, green, amber and gold.

One wall is decorated with a world map picture that is printed in a vintage style in warm tones.

There is also a large mirror in the area which is accompanied by a large wicker basket filled with cosy blankets and a cluster of large glass lanterns stand on the floor filled with white candles.

Bringing nature inside their abode, there are plants and fresh flowers in the area that leads into a chrome and grey kitchen kitted out with all the mod-cons you would expect.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The pair's relaxed dining area is a large wooden table with benches that gives the space a family feel underneath a straight staircase that leads up to the first floor.

The home boasts a second living area that showcases Brooke's boho-chic taste.

She has selected two grey crushed velvet sofas for the room which are accompanied by a large matching footstool.

Adding a girlie touch, the seating area is decorated with blush coloured pillows.

There is also a fluffy fur style rug on the floor in front of a large ornate carved frame mirror that has been distressed as well as a shabby-chic grey storage bowl.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The dining room is flooded with natural light as it has large floor to ceiling windows.

The formal area has an exposed-brick feature wall and super shiny resin white table with velour seats around the outside.

There is also a large TV mounted onto the wall - incase they want to catch the football or watch the soaps as they eat.

Brooke and Kean's outside area is simply stunning.

(Image: Instagram)

The pair can sit outside in their granite garden that has a sleek pond in the center and wicker outdoor furniture.

There is also a flower patch that brings a touch of colour the slate grey tones of the urban nature design.
description: The Coronation Street actress welcomed her bundle of joy earlier this week and here is a glimpse inside the home she shares with her footballer beau
